root.name: The King of Fighters Collection: The Orochi Saga
root.description: This package contains emulated versions of the following Neo Geo games:The King of Fighters '94 The King of Fighters '95 The King of Fighters '96 The King of Fighters '97 The King of Fighters '98 The games are emulated in arcade mode (as opposed to the home AES mode) and have additional hooks in place to allow for a basic training mode. The game also has a challenge mode that unlocks concept art and music as you complete tasks. Despite a similar PS2 KOF compilation being released in Japan with online play, this collection doesn't offer any such option.

similar_games.game: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior
